posts.title: Hi there
posts.content:
Hi, welcome to my blog!

My name is Layla. I am from Shanghai and now studying in Hong Kong. A special engineering girl;)

I tried to put something interesting here, and may upload some blogs in the future. You can know more about me by checking the projects I did and activities I attended.

Anyway, nice to meet you :D
